title: Self-Directed Learning Course for Understanding Oral Cancer

context.additional_context: Flexible scheduling and digitally supported learning environments for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three major symptoms and risk factors of oral cancer.
Learners can perform self-examination methods for early detection of oral cancer with 80% accuracy in a simulation environment.
Learners acquire communication skills to convey oral cancer prevention strategies to community members.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
